mapper.select: select ffl.id, ffl.fund_info_code AS fundInfoCode, ffl.money1, ffl.money2, ffl.money3, ffl.money4, ffl.money5, ffl.money6, ffl.money7, ffl.money8, ffl.money9, ffl.money10, ffl.money11, ffl.money12, ffl.money13, ffl.money14, ffl.money15, ffl.money16, ffl.money17, ffl.money18, ffl.money19, ffl.money20, ffi.fund_name AS fundName, ffi.max_net_worth_date AS maxNetWorthDate, ffi.max_net_worth AS maxNetWorth, ffnwt.level_number AS levelNumber from u_fund_level_money ffl left join f_fund_info ffi on ffi.fund_code=ffl.fund_info_code left join f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt on ffnwt.fund_info_code=ffl.fund_info_code where ffl.user_id=#{userId} limit #{page} , #{limit};
select count(*) from u_fund_level_money where user_id=#{userId}

select id, fund_info_code AS fundInfoCode, money1, money2, money3, money4, money5, money6, money7, money8, money9, money10, money11, money12, money13, money14, money15, money16, money17, money18, money19, money20 from u_fund_level_money where fund_info_code=#{id}
